name: Cabeza
description:
The famous board game created by Jaime Poniachik,  now on mobiles, mac and windows. It combines the classic flat board with a new 3D movement..

Quick instructions:
- The main objective is to go with your rounded flat chip, named "Cabeza", to the other side of the board without being crushed by the opponent.
- Another way to win is to crush the opponent's "Cabeza" with your cubes, just rotating in top of it
- "Cabeza": it is the rounded flat chip. It can move in any direction, one or two places per turn.
- Cubes: the movement is by rotation, the big cube can rotate only once per turn, the others can rotate one or two times per turn.
